entities.description: Professor Moody is described as speaking each word as the ferret hit the stone floor and bounced upward again.

entities.name: mcgonagall
entities.description: Professor McGonagall is introduced coming down the marble staircase with her arms full of books.

entities.description: The ferret is described as flying through the air, its legs and tail flailing helplessly.

relationships.description: Professor Moody scolds the ferret for doing something wrong, as described by his words 'Never — do — that — again —'.
Professor Moody interacts with Professor McGonagall, greeting her calmly while bouncing the ferret.
